summary: Comprehensive testing of Smart Campus Analytics system completed. Frontend UI works excellently with vibrant design and all major features functional. Backend APIs operational after database seeding. Minor authentication configuration and HTML structure issues identified.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Session token creation via Python script not recognized - requires MongoDB manual insertion
flaky_endpoints.impact: Automated testing difficult, but manual session creation works
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Use MongoDB shell to create test sessions directly

ui_bugs.issue: HTML structure warning - nested tbody elements causing hydration error
No clickable links from Students Explorer to individual student details

passed_tests: Landing page loads with vibrant purple-blue gradient design
Google auth login button redirects to auth.emergentagent.com correctly
Backend health endpoint returns healthy status (/api/health)
Database successfully seeded with 500 students, 50 courses
Backend analytics endpoints return correct KPI data (/api/analytics/*)
Backend students endpoint returns paginated student list
Backend courses endpoint returns course list with difficulty metrics
Dashboard loads with authenticated session showing real data
All 4 KPI cards display correct values (500 students, 17 at-risk, 64.2% engagement, 35 burnout)
Dashboard charts render properly (engagement trend, risk distribution, course difficulty)
Students Explorer shows 500 students with search and filter functionality
Students table displays name, major, GPA, engagement, attendance, risk level
Courses Analytics page shows difficulty leaderboard and course cards
Navigation between Dashboard, Students, and Courses pages works
Responsive design and vibrant UI styling throughout application
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix HTML structure in StudentsExplorer (nested tbody issue) and implement clickable navigation from Students Explorer to Student Detail pages. Backend authentication works but needs streamlined test session creation.

success_percentage.backend: 90% - All endpoints functional, minor auth testing issue
success_percentage.integration: 90% - Authentication and data loading works perfectly
